snippet: Golden State extended the best start in N.B.A. history by beating the Hornets in Charlotte as Stephen Curry scored 40 points in three quarters for the fourth times this season
abstract: NBA Roundup; Golden State Warriors defeat Charlotte Hornets, 116-99, to extend best start in NBA history to 20-0; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Golden State extended the best start in N.B.A. history by beating the Hornets in Charlotte as Stephen Curry scored 40 points in three quarters for the fourth times this season
